attributes.long-description:
With authentic darts playing feel, prepare for fun as you control your throws precisely and easily. Challenge 21 different computer opponents with a range of playing skills, or play against a friend.

- Varied Play Modes – including Practice, Versus, Arcade, Career and Custom Tournament play

- Numerous Game Types – including 701, 501, 301, Around the Clock, Around the Clock Reverse and Cricket.

- 2-player Multiplayer – play with friends and family in versus play modes

- Player Rewards - unlock new dart boards, flights & dart sets

- Arcade Mode - start at the bottom and progress from rookie to pro with the ultimate goal of becoming the best player, whilst winning special rewards and secrets

Copyright ©2010 Icon Games Entertainment Ltd.

One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Arcade Darts™
